steps.title: Welcome to Tellstones
steps.msg: Tellstones is a game of memory and bluffing. Let's learn the basics in a few steps.

steps.title: Placing Stones
steps.msg: You and the opponent (Master) take turns placing stones on the table. The central stone (neutral) is already there.
steps.action: Drag a stone from your reserve (left) to any empty space on the board.

steps.title: Hiding Information
steps.msg: After all stones are placed (or whenever you want), you can flip a stone face down to hide it.
steps.action: DOUBLE CLICK on the stone you just placed to hide it.

steps.title: Peeking at Stones
steps.msg: At any time, you can check a hidden stone (face down) to remember the symbol. Only you will see it.
steps.action: DOUBLE CLICK on a face-down stone to peek at it (it will flip momentarily).

steps.title: Swapping Stones
steps.msg: You can swap two stones to confuse the opponent.
steps.action: Click and drag a stone from the table over another stone to swap their positions.

steps.title: Challenging the Opponent
steps.msg: If you think the opponent doesn't know which stone is which, you can challenge them. They will have to guess correctly or lose the point.
steps.action: Click the 'Challenge' button and prepare to test the Master.

steps.title: Answering the Challenge
steps.msg: Now reverse roles. The Master will challenge you! You need to prove you know what the stone is.
steps.action: The Master will challenge you now. Select the correct stone when prompted.

steps.title: Boasting
steps.msg: If you know ALL the face-down stones, you can 'Boast'. This is a risky move to win the game instantly.

steps.title: Defending against 'Boast'
steps.msg: The Master says they know everything! They are boasting. You can Doubt (they have to prove it), Believe (they get 1 point) or Boast as well.

steps.title: Proving your Knowledge
steps.msg: Now it's your turn! The Master doubted you (or you chose to attack). Prove you know where the stones are.
steps.action: Click on the options to identify each stone sequentially.

steps.title: Tutorial Finished
steps.msg: Congratulations! You completed the basic tutorial.
steps.action: Now you can play full matches.
